credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
provenance: Blumka Gallery, New York/ Robert L. Metzenberg
description: Long flat leaf-shaped blade. Ribbed bolster. Almond-section handle, wood scales inlaid with metal wires in scrolls, trefoils and dots along length. Steel cap at terminal.
name: Knife
